welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Sucy-en-Brie, France! Explore our beautiful city known for its historic sites, breathtaking landscapes, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and enjoy all that Sucy-en-Brie has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Orly Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Orly Airport, used for low-cost airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a wide range of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main hub for Air France and other SkyTeam alliance airlines, with several sub-terminals serving different regions.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slower in some areas during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and corporate jets.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
